ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Hi! I'm Dean, an experienced developer with a passion for building beautiful, high-performing web experiences. I specialize in modern technologies and love helping businesses and creators launch standout landing pages.
PROJECTS_SUBTITLE: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently. Each one represents a unique challenge and solution.

PROJECTS_OVERVIEW_TEXT_2: The project demonstrates modern web development practices and innovative solutions to real-world challenges.
PROJECTS_OVERVIEW_TEXT_3: Built with cutting-edge technologies and designed with user experience in mind, this project represents the latest in web development excellence.
PROJECTS_PORTFOLIO_DESC: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features smooth animations, dark mode, and a blog section with MDX support.
PROJECTS_ECOMMERCE_DESC: A full-stack e-commerce solution with Stripe payment integration, product management, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
PROJECTS_CHAT_DESC: A modern chat application with real-time messaging, file sharing, and group chat functionality using WebSocket technology.
PROJECTS_DASHBOARD_DESC: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with interactive charts, real-time data visualization, and customizable reporting tools.
PROJECTS_MOBILE_DESC: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native, featuring offline functionality and push notifications.
PROJECTS_SAAS_DESC: A subscription-based SaaS platform with user management, billing integration, and advanced analytics.
TESTIMONIAL_1_QUOTE: Dean made launching my project a breeze. The design is beautiful and the experience is seamless!

TESTIMONIAL_4_QUOTE: The best investment I made for my business this year. Highly recommended!

CONTACT_SUBTITLE: I'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form or reach out via social links below.
FAQ_ANSWER_1: I offer comprehensive web development services including custom websites, e-commerce platforms, mobile apps, and SaaS solutions. I specialize in modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js.
FAQ_QUESTION_2: How long does a typical project take?
FAQ_ANSWER_2: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A simple landing page might take 1-2 weeks, while a full e-commerce platform could take 6-12 weeks. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
FAQ_ANSWER_3: Yes! I offer ongoing maintenance, updates, and support packages to ensure your project continues to perform optimally. We can discuss support options that fit your needs and budget.
FAQ_QUESTION_4: How do I get started with a project?
FAQ_ANSWER_4: Simply reach out through the contact form or email me directly. I'll schedule a consultation to discuss your project requirements, timeline, and budget. From there, we can create a detailed proposal.
